statements: SELECT * FROM alarm_settings
SELECT trigger_name, notification_preference FROM alarm_settings WHERE trigger_value > 10
SELECT id, trigger_name FROM alarm_settings ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM alarm_settings WHERE notification_preference = 'email'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alarms FROM alarm_settings
SELECT id, trigger_name, trigger_value, notification_preference FROM alarm_settings WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY trigger_name DESC
SELECT * FROM alarm_settings WHERE trigger_value < 100 ORDER BY notification_preference
SELECT notification_preference, trigger_value FROM alarm_settings WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY trigger_value ASC
SELECT trigger_name, id FROM alarm_settings WHERE trigger_value = 50
SELECT notification_preference, trigger_name FROM alarm_settings WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trigger_name DESC
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE threshold_value > 50;
SELECT trigger_name, is_enabled FROM alarm_triggers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, sms_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM notification_preferences WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, trigger_name, threshold_value FROM alarm_triggers ORDER BY threshold_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trigger_name, threshold_value FROM alarm_triggers WHERE is_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY trigger_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM notification_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT email_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE sms_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT id, trigger_name, threshold_value, is_enabled FROM alarm_triggers JOIN notification_preferences ON alarm_triggers.id = notification_preferences.user_id ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_settings ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT trigger_name FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE mobile_notifications = FALSE;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_enabled = TRUE AND trigger_name = 'High Priority';
SELECT user_id, theme_color, language FROM user_settings;
SELECT * FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, language FROM user_settings WHERE theme_color = 'dark';
SELECT id, trigger_name FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, mobile_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE AND mobile_notifications = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers JOIN notification_preferences ON alarm_triggers.id = notification_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE activation_time > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY threshold DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, threshold FROM alarm_triggers WHERE threshold > 100 ORDER BY trigger_name;
SELECT user_id, email_notification, push_notification FROM notification_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT trigger_id, triggered_at, notification_sent FROM trigger_logs WHERE notification_sent = true ORDER BY triggered_at ASC;
SELECT id, trigger_name, activation_time, threshold FROM alarm_triggers ORDER BY activation_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email_notification, sms_notification, push_notification FROM notification_preferences WHERE email_notification = true AND sms_notification = false;
SELECT user_id, timezone, language FROM user_settings WHERE timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT trigger_id, triggered_at, notification_sent FROM trigger_logs ORDER BY triggered_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers JOIN trigger_logs ON alarm_triggers.id = trigger_logs.trigger_id WHERE notification_sent = true;
SELECT * FROM alarm_settings;
SELECT threshold_value, trigger_status FROM alarm_settings ORDER BY threshold_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM notification_settings WHERE email_notification = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE sound_notification = FALSE;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM alarm_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_settings ORDER BY threshold_value DESC;
SELECT alarm_id, trigger_status FROM alarm_settings WHERE trigger_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode_preference = TRUE ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT log_id, alarm_id, log_timestamp FROM alarm_logs WHERE alarm_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, notification_id, log_message FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_id IN (1, 2, 3);
